cogimag.javafx.keyboard

Class FxCharConstruction

  • java.lang.Object
    • cogimag.javafx.keyboard.FxCharConstruction

  • public class FxCharConstruction
extends java.lang.Object
    Object contains four primitives that identify printable characters. Supports automated typing utility FxKeyEventSteno. Because that class uses KeyEvent, this object collects the parameters needed to construct a KeyEvent and fire it via Event. The field variables are final, being set once in the constructor and accessed (read-only) directly thereafter.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String displayedCharacter
      the appearance of the character on the screen, such as a, A, 1, !
      javafx.scene.input.KeyCode intKeyCode
      The KeyCode enum of the key, such as KeyCode.A or KeyCode.DIGIT1
      boolean isShifted
      true if shift must be pressed in combination with the base key to get the rendering
      java.lang.String strKeyCode
      The String representation of the FX KeyCode, such as a or 1.
